sherryt wrote:
Had biopsy 11-9
Met with surgeon this past Wednesday These are the words he underlined and talked about
 in path report
INVASIVE HIGH GRADE DUCTAL CARCINOMA (only thing discussed or mentioned)
He did not address the rest which read WITH FOCAL METAPLASTIC. SPINDLE CELL FEATURES
NO INTRAVASCULAR OR PERINURAL INVASION IDENTIIFED
COMMENT AT END OF REPORT
tHIS LESION REPRESENTS AN UNUSUAL FORM OF HIGH GRADEINFILTRATING CARCINOMA IN WHICH THERE ARE SUFFICIENT SPINSLE CELSTO WARRANT A DIAGNOSIS OF FOCAL METAPLASTIC FEATURES
So obviously after reading whole report at home and researching on internet am confused and terrified!
Called nurse coordinator this am with these questions and she was to consult with Dr and call me.
Anyone here with similar experience or helpful knowledge?
